name: @eidoo/ethapi-lib
description: A minimalistic wrapper for the ETH API service.

scripts.release: git add . && yarn version && VERSION=$(yarn -s version:current) && git push origin release/v$VERSION && git push origin v$VERSION && git checkout master && git pull --rebase && git rebase release/v$VERSION && git push origin master && git checkout dev && git pull --rebase && git rebase release/v$VERSION && git push origin dev
